column4: No...it's running 2 X sessions, one per monitor. For example, right now I have a browser open in the primary and this IRC chat open in the other via pidgin. :D
afaik twinview isn't meaningful on multiple cards, and xinerama *might* not work in the current x server. I think this is improving in the next one, I don't know what the state in the current one is.
afaik it'll actually get fixed properly in the next minor version of randr (replacing xinerama). But you really should get confirmation from someone else, I'm no expert on this.
